mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.business_trip_address businessTripAddress, a.business_trip_reason businessTripReason, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id,'') processInstanceId, a.state, a.remark, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '草稿' WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' WHEN '4' THEN '作废' WHEN '5' THEN '撤销' END stateName, b.user_name userName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM check_work_business_travel a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{businessTripId} AND a.create_id = b.user_id

SELECT b.title timeName, a.id, a.time_id timeId, a.time_start_time timeStartTime, a.time_end_time timeEndTime, a.business_travel_day businessTravelDay, a.business_travel_hour businessTravelHour, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '未提交审批' WHEN '1' THEN '等待审批' WHEN '2' THEN '审批通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审批不通过' END stateName, a.remark FROM check_work_business_travel_time_slot a LEFT JOIN check_work_time b ON a.time_id = b.id WHERE a.business_travel_id = #{businessTripId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into check_work_business_travel (id, title, odd_number, business_trip_address, business_trip_reason, state, process_instance_id, remark, enclosure_info, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{oddNumber}, #{businessTripAddress}, #{businessTripReason}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

insert into check_work_business_travel_time_slot (id, business_travel_id, time_id, time_start_time, time_end_time, business_travel_day, business_travel_hour, state, remark) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.businessTripId}, #{item.timeId}, #{item.timeStartTime}, #{item.timeEndTime}, #{item.businessTravelDay}, #{item.businessTravelHour}, '0', #{item.remark})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.business_trip_address businessTripAddress, a.business_trip_reason businessTripReason, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id, '') processInstanceId, a.state, a.remark, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, b.user_name userName FROM check_work_business_travel a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{businessTripId} AND a.create_id = b.user_id

SELECT a.time_id timeId, a.time_start_time timeStartTime, a.time_end_time timeEndTime, a.business_travel_day businessTravelDay, a.business_travel_hour businessTravelHour, a.remark FROM check_work_business_travel_time_slot a WHERE a.business_travel_id = #{businessTripId}
SELECT a.id, a.create_id createId FROM check_work_business_travel a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}

SELECT b.id FROM check_work_business_travel a, check_work_business_travel_time_slot b WHERE a.create_id = #{createId} AND a.id = b.business_travel_id AND b.state = '2' AND b.time_id = #{timeId} AND b.business_travel_day = #{businessTravelDay}

SELECT a.id, '出差' title, a.business_travel_day 'start', a.business_travel_day 'end' FROM check_work_business_travel_time_slot a, check_work_business_travel b WHERE b.create_id = #{userId} AND b.id = a.business_travel_id AND a.state = '2' AND a.time_id = #{timeId}
